name: test_e2e_with_logs[448_LDAP_BLIND_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `LDAP_BLIND_007` |
| **Name** | LDAP blind admin password enumeration |
| **Category** | LDAP |
| **Subcategory** | blind_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `*)(uid=admin)(password=test*`
- **Encoded**: `%2A%29%28uid%3Dadmin%29%28password%3Dtest%2A`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~76000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:11:06.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX LDAP Injection] Authentication bypass attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=LDAP_BLIND_007-1772266266145-wjvndq pattern_id=LDAP_BLIND_007 uri=/?q=%2A%29%28uid%3Dadmin%29%28password%3Dtest%2A client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=LDAP_BLIND_007-1772266266145-wjvndq pattern_id=LDAP_BLIND_007 uri=/?q=%2A%29%28uid%3Dadmin%29%28password%3Dtest%2A client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
08:11:06.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=LDAP_BLIND_007-1772266266145-wjvndq pattern_id=LDAP_BLIND_007 uri=/?q=%2A%29%28uid%3Dadmin%29%28password%3Dtest%2A client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
